subject: Web3
title: Nouns DAO
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Nouns DAO.

hook.text: Nouns DAO auctions one pixel-art character every 24 hours. All proceeds go to a community-controlled treasury.

buildup.text: Each Noun gives its owner one vote in the DAO. The treasury grew to over $50 million from daily auctions.

discovery.text: Noun holders funded public goods: murals, charity donations, a Nouns float in the Rose Bowl Parade.

twist.text: A faction of holders grew frustrated with spending and proposed 'rage quitting' â€” leaving and taking their share of the treasury.

climax.text: Nouns showed DAOs can fund real-world projects. It also showed that long-term alignment is hard to maintain.

punchline.text: One pixel character, sold daily, funded millions in community projects.

quiz.question: How does Nouns DAO generate revenue?
options: Auctioning one pixel-art character every 24 hours
